steps.title: Find and tap the icon.
steps.content: Find and tap the icon. You'll see it on your Home screen or in the Productivity folder of your App Library.

steps.title: You'll see the Browse tab on the bottom-right.
steps.content: You'll see the Browse tab on the bottom-right. This button looks like a folder. It will open a list of all your available file locations.

steps.title: The file might be saved to your iPhone on your iCloud Drive.
steps.content: The file might be saved to your iPhone on your iCloud Drive. Tap iCloud Drive or On My iPhone to go to one of these locations. There, you'll see additional folders that might contain the file you're looking for.

steps.title: This will open the selected file in its default application.
steps.content: This will open the selected file in its default application. If your file is stored on the cloud, tapping will download it before opening.
